Silent Solar

Characters

  • Tom Kernan
  • Loretta Diangelo
  • Abby Geist

Scenes

Loretta Diangelo was soaking some red kidney beans in the kitchen. Over her shoulder, she remarked to Tom, "Christianity, you know, is white supremacist."

"It is?"

"Of course: it has been instrumental in a system of white oppression and worldwide terrorism for 500 years."
